topic.title: Author Guidelines
topic.section:
The authors can view bibliographic and formatting standards via Author Guidelines, and further via items of Submission Preparation Checklist for references. Copyright Notice and Privacy Statement are also listed below. All these can be accessed under Online Submissions on About the Conference page.

The authors may check Call for Papers to better understand conference themes and topics, Conference Tracks to learn types of submissions desired, and Conference Timeline to properly arrange the submission. It is also suggested to browse published papers of previous conferences to obtain a clear idea of aspects that are not detailed by guidelines.
